name: Retrace: A Heartfelt Confession
description:
Are you sure you want to hear this?

Very well, then.

Please listen to this heartfelt confession of mine.

A companion piece for the game Retrace, intended to be read after finishing the game. Set after the "Gold" ending, it recounts a certain conversation had in the illusory world, and provides some additional details and motivations left unspoken in the game itself.

Please note that as a confession, it naturally contains spoilers for the story and ending of Retrace. For you who have already enjoyed the story, please enjoy its guts to your heart's content.

This story will be released on the 22nd October, 2020.
